poem:
### National Beer Day

Raise your glass on this unsentimental day,  
brewed from petals that never wither,  
served in the vessel of everyday.  
A toast to love without an occasion,  
where hops dance unfettered,  
and bubbles speak in the language of rain.  
Here's to the unspoken vows  
held beneath a foam-topped sky.
